posts.post_title: WTB T206 Graded Hal Chase Trophy and Joe Doyle
posts.post_content: WTB T206 Graded Hal Chase Trophy and Joe Doyle. Working on my Highlander collection and need these 2 cards to get closer to completing it. Please shoot me a pm or email. My email is [url]rleonzi@sbcglobal.net[/url]. Thanks.
